check_scores.title: check_scores
check_scores.description: Checks that the player has the specified scoreboard value(s). Click Properties, then type in the scoreboard name in the input box and click the 'add' button. Scoreboards are case-sensitive

check_tags.title: check_tags
check_tags.description: Check if all listed tags are on the player; if a listed tag starts with !, check if that tag is not on the player instead

items_in_inventory.title: items_in_inventory
items_in_inventory.description: Checks that all of the specified items are present in the player's inventory

items.title: Item
items.description: Checks that a specific item stack exists in the player's inventory. All conditions given here must match to succeed. All fields are optional, but at least one of (lore|name|type) must be specified. Items found are not removed.

lore.title: lore
lore.description: Matches if any line of lore text *contains* this string.

name.title: name
name.description: Matches if the item name *contains* this string.

type.title: type
type.description: Matches if the item type is exactly this Material. List of available materials can be found here: https://hub.spigotmc.org/javadocs/spigot/org/bukkit/Material.html

count.title: count
count.description: The minimum number of items matching the specified lore/name/type that must be present to succeed. If 0, will succeed only if no matched items are present. This will match items in multiple stacks, for example a stack of 5 and a stack of 8 will match a count of 10.

item_in_hand.title: item_in_hand
item_in_hand.description: Checks that all of the conditions match for the item in the player's main hand

items.title: Item
items.description: Checks that a specific item stack exists in the player's inventory. All conditions given here must match to succeed. All fields are optional, but at least one of (lore|name|type) must be specified. Items found are not removed.

lore.title: lore
lore.description: Matches if any line of lore text *contains* this string.

name.title: name
name.description: Matches if the item name *contains* this string.

type.title: type
type.description: Matches if the item type is exactly this Material. List of available materials can be found here: https://hub.spigotmc.org/javadocs/spigot/org/bukkit/Material.html

count.title: count
count.description: The minimum number of items matching the specified lore/name/type that must be present to succeed. If 0, will succeed only if no matched items are present. This will match items in multiple stacks, for example a stack of 5 and a stack of 8 will match a count of 10.

location.title: location
location.description: Checks that the player is inside the specified location.

and.title: and
and.description: Returns true if all contained prerequisites are true, false otherwise

or.title: or
or.description: Returns true if any contained prerequisite is true, false otherwise

not_and.title: not_and
not_and.description: Returns true if any contained prerequisite is false, false otherwise

not_or.title: not_or
not_or.description: Returns true if all contained prerequisites are false, false otherwise
